thread.title: Crews Resume Search For Missing Duquesne University Grad Student
thread.title_full: Crews Resume Search For Missing Duquesne University Grad Student

author: CBS Pittsburgh
title: Crews Resume Search For Missing Duquesne University Grad Student

organizations.name: missing duquesne university grad student february

text:
February 21, 2017 at 2:34 PM 
I don’t want to seem gender biased. But a lot of taxpayer money has already gone into this search. Volunteers are fine, but you have to draw the line somewhere on expenditure of limited city/county funds. After a month, he is either dead (and the river will give him up in the spring.) Or..he doesn’t want to be FOUND. I wish the family luck in their search. But the use of taxpayer funds should be over. This is now a recovery operation. FYI-Was a cop for 30 years AND I am white. Would the city/county government spend as much on a minority search? Just askin!
